With elements of action games and RPG Startegiya. Choose one of several pirate captains, crew together to go swimming in the seven seas!
The game is set in the 16th century, during the golden age of piracy. Now you have every chance to become the most famous pirate, and conquer the Caribbean! In order to advance in rank pirate fraternity, have the strength, courage and cunning, and to advance faster than they have to bribe and kill. Upon reaching the highest rank you have in your possession a strength that can be developed, and the other captains of the fleet. Only through the destruction of other strengths, to be the king of all pirates.
The game combines elements of intense naval battles and the surface of city management.


Join, champion, and unite the three pirate factions: Pirates, privateers and buccaneers. Ultimately, should take this unit in a war against the evil Black Pirates Cove. Manage and develop the parts of three strengths and visit them to collect faction missions and plot. Visit the alchemist to know what special ingredients are necessary for the crazy potions and embark on adventures to find and collect them. Union of the three pirate factions to access their hero units and ultimately defeat the Black Pirates Cove and become King of all pirates. If you have what it takes to be.

Black Pirates Cove: Origins DLC

Origins of the Black Pirates Cove takes place in the days before Black Cove faction was founded. Assume the role of legendary captain grog - the pirate who got tired of losing the most valuable treasure ships bound for pirate clans.

Being outnumbered against the union pirate, Captain Punch decides to plant the seeds of betrayal by one of the clans of pirates in order to get them to fight each other. After the successful separation of the alliance between the pirates and the new union met with the dark forces of the Forgotten Island, which then form a new faction - the Black Covians.
